scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary, crowned and with hands clasped in prayer, surrounded by a multitude of angels with vibrantly colored wings. Above her, God the Father, depicted as an elderly man with a beard, blesses the scene. The background is a celestial expanse of blue clouds and golden light, with additional angelic figures visible in the upper left. On the far right, a figure in a niche, possibly a saint or prophet, stands within an architectural frame. The overall composition evokes a heavenly vision, with the Virgin Mary as the central figure of devotion.
